thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 14 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Carriage Services Announces 2017 Annual Results And Raises Rolling Four Quarter Outlook

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Carriage Services Announces 2017 Annual Results And Raises Rolling Four Quarter Outlook
text:
Carriage Services Inc:
* CARRIAGE SERVICES ANNOUNCES 2017 ANNUAL RESULTS AND RAISES ROLLING FOUR QUARTER OUTLOOK
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.39 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.31 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 3.5 PERCENT TO $65.1 MILLION * INCREASING ROLLING FOUR QUARTER ‘ROUGHLY RIGHT OUTLOOK RANGE’ OF ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE TO $2.00 - $2.05 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
